privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we protect your data.

intro.title: Privacy Policy
intro.description: At AltaMayuz, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our services.

overview.title: Information Overview
overview.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, contact us, or use our services. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and other contact information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when registering, expressing interest in obtaining information about us or our products and services, or contacting us.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your information, including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits to ensure your data remains safe.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.

contact.title: Questions About Privacy?
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please don't hesitate to contact us.

termsPolicy.title: Terms & Conditions
termsPolicy.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services.

userRights.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

restrictions.title: Restrictions
restrictions.content: You may not use our services to transmit, distribute, or deliver any unlawful, harassing, libelous, abusive, threatening, harmful, vulgar, obscene, or otherwise objectionable material.

liability.content: AltaMayuz shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.
